name: Brooks Distance Long Sleeve Top - Men's
description:
A semi-relaxed fit keeps you in the zone when adding mileage to your runs. Sweat-wicking technology and soft fabric add a touch of comfort.DriLayer recycled polyester and lyocell blend is quick-drying and soft.Fabric wicks sweat away from skin to keep you comfortable.Semi-fitted to contour to your body and let you move freely.

        Sustainability
